Text.Page:
You can't cross a dune without running up against those kulkari scavengers. My orders are to kill them on sight, but I might as well try to wipe out an anthill by stomping them one by one.

I'm sick of fighting them, but what else can I do? If you see any {@LinkCreature:24#56#Sand Wind scavengers}, do me a favor and kill a few.
Not bad! If you're heading back to Tulufan, have a drink on me, <PCCLASS:lcase>.
